other_title: バンジョウのカルメルさん (Japanese)
plot: The beginning contains an advertisement for the Shakugan no Shana movie. A short scene follows with Wilhelmina Carmel standing on the edge of a cliff overlooking the sea where she comments on her being absent in the film. After this scene comes a similar one where Wilhelmina reveals that the second season anime series is currently in production.
opening_theme: "Those Who Fly Through the Sky" by ???
